item.description:
You are invited to the Salem pug meetup Halloween party!

Please come to a pug meet up at:
73 Valley Street, Salem, MA 01970.
10am-12pm

We are hoping you will all bring your best dressed babies to the October meet up! Costumes are not required BUT we hope you will join in the fun (People need not dress up).


Goodies for the pups will be supplied by me to take home. If anyone is willing to help; here is a list of things I think it would be fun / necessary to have:

tennis balls
tug o war toys
any other fun toy you have and want to share for a few hours
Ice Water ( thanks to everyone who brought last time)
Puppy pick up bags for poop

Its been great to see all the pictures after each meet up, so thanks to everyone who has contributed!

group.name: The Northshore MA Pug Meetup Group

item.name: The Salem Pug Halloween Meetup
